content:
The Copenhagen town hall building

Hacking privacy into Facebook's Messenger in 24 hours

Hackathons are great. When a friend of mine asked me if I wanted to go with
him to Copenhacks I had no idea that we would spend
24 hours reverse engineering Facebook's Messenger,
let alone win first place.
